Illinois has the highest wireless taxes in America at 33.8%, making phone bills even more painful. Vouch Mobile helps Chicagoans fight back with transparent $30/month pricing and no hidden fees.

Network

AT&T Coverage in Chicago

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing Chicago residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the metro area. With 99% population coverage and average speeds of 55 Mbps, you'll stay connected wherever you go in the Chicago area.

As part of the 9.4 million population metro, Chicago benefits from AT&T's ongoing network investment and 5G expansion.

Benefits

Why Chicago Residents Choose Vouch

Chicago's average phone bill of $118/month gets hit with America's highest wireless taxes—Vouch cuts your base cost by 75%.

Whether you're riding the L, commuting on Metra, or working in the Loop, you need coverage that spans the city and suburbs.

No credit check means Northwestern students, new Chicago residents, and service workers can sign up instantly.

AT&T has invested $4.8 billion in Illinois network infrastructure from 2020-2024.

Who Benefits

Vouch Mobile for Chicago Locals

L Riders

Chicago's 127.5 million annual rail riders need coverage that works above and below ground. Vouch keeps you connected on the CTA.

Finance Workers

Chicago's financial district demands constant connectivity. Vouch delivers the Loop coverage you need at a fraction of the price.

Healthcare Workers

Hospital staff across Chicagoland's major medical centers rely on their phones. Vouch fits healthcare worker budgets.

Students

Northwestern, UChicago, Loyola, and DePaul students need affordable wireless. No credit check makes signup easy for students.

FAQ

Chicago Coverage Questions

Everything you need to know about Vouch Mobile in Chicago

Yes! Vouch Mobile provides 99% coverage across the Chicago metro area using AT&T's network. From the Loop to the suburbs, you'll have reliable 5G and LTE service throughout Chicagoland.

Chicago residents pay an average of $118/month for phone service, plus Illinois has America's highest wireless taxes at 33.8%. With Vouch at $30/month, you could save over $1,056 per year.

Yes! You'll have coverage throughout the CTA system, including L trains and buses. Underground stations on the Blue and Red Lines have cellular coverage, keeping you connected during your commute.

Yes! AT&T 5G is available throughout Chicago, with coverage at high-traffic venues like the United Center, Soldier Field, O'Hare, and Midway airports. 57% of Illinois has AT&T 5G coverage.

Illinois has the highest wireless taxes in the nation at 33.8%, adding significant cost to your bill. Vouch's simple $30/month pricing helps you avoid some of the pain of high-tax wireless.

No credit check required. Whether you're a UIC student, a new Chicago resident, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly with no credit inquiry.
